thread.title: Kohl’s Cardholders: FIVE Pairs Of Boots ONLY $50 Shipped + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash (HOT!!)
thread.title_full: Kohl’s Cardholders: FIVE Pairs Of Boots ONLY $50 Shipped + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash (HOT!!)

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: Kohl’s Cardholders: FIVE Pairs Of Boots ONLY $50 Shipped + Earn $10 Kohl’s Cash (HOT!!)

organizations.name: sonoma goods for life brynn women’s suede boots

text:
Time to save BIG on Boots! Kohl’s.com is currently offering up lots of deep discounts on women’s boots ! Plus, through March 26th, you can save an extra $10 off your $75+ purchase of select women’s clothing, activewear, accessories, jewelry, shoes and beauty purchase with the code TRENDY10 at checkout!
Even sweeter, through March 26th, Kohl’s cardholders can save 30% off their entire purchase with the promo code LUCKY30 at checkout AND score FREE shipping on every order with the code FS4MARCH !

Check out these *HOT* Boot Deals… Apt. 9 Women’s Zipper & Tassel Ankle Boots $14.99 (reg. $74.99)
ONLY $10.49 shipped w/ codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
SONOMA Goods for Life Women’s Suede Wedge Ankle Boots $15.99 (reg. $79.99)
ONLY $11.19 shipped w/ codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Mudd Women’s Fringe Riding Boots $15.99 (reg. $79.99)
ONLY $11.19 shipped w/ codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
SONOMA Goods for Life Women’s Suede Pull-On Boots $16.99 (reg. $84.99)
ONLY $11.89 shipped w/ codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
SONOMA Goods for Life Brynn Women’s Suede Boots – Brown $17.99 (reg. $89.99)
ONLY $12.59 shipped w/ codes LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH 
Even better, buy all 5 and save MORE! Buy 1 Apt. 9 Women’s Zipper & Tassel Ankle Boots $14.99 (reg. $74.99)
Buy 1 SONOMA Goods for Life Women’s Suede Wedge Ankle Boots $15.99 (reg. $79.99)
Buy 1 Mudd Women’s Fringe Riding Boots $15.99 (reg. $79.99)
Buy 1 SONOMA Goods for Life Women’s Suede Pull-On Boots $16.99 (reg. $84.99)
Buy 1 SONOMA Goods for Life Brynn Women’s Suede Boots – Brown $17.99 (reg. $89.99)
Total = $81.95
Use promo codes TRENDY10 ($10 off $75), LUCKY30 (30% off) and FS4MARCH (free ship)
Final cost $50.36 shipped plus earn $10 Kohl’s Cash!
That’s just $10.07 per pair of boots shipped right to your doorstep!
Not a Kohl’s cardholder? You can still save an extra 15% off your entire purchase with code SAVE15 at checkout (expires 3/26)! Keep in mind that standard shipping is free on any order of $75 or starts at $5.95 for orders less than $75 OR opt for free in-store pick up if available at a store near you.
And through March 26th, you’ll get $10 in Kohl’s Cash for every $50 you spend. You can then use your earned Kohl’s Cash coupon from March 27th-April 2nd.
